meanings.definition: A person who attends the same school as another.
meanings.sent1: My schoolmates and I play together during recess.
meanings.sent2: I have many schoolmates in my class.
meanings.sent3: Our schoolmates always make the classroom lively.
meanings.sent4: Being schoolmates is like being part of a big family.
meanings.sent5: The bond between schoolmates can last a lifetime.

meanings.sent1: We invited all our schoolmates to the party.
meanings.sent2: The schoolmates gathered for a group project.
meanings.sent3: The schoolmates shared their lunch and laughed together.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with chatter as the schoolmates caught up.
meanings.sent5: The schoolmates cheered for each other during the game.
